name: CANCER_RISK_REQ_COMMENT
description: This table contains additional information about the statuses for risk models whose scores were user requested.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: SCORE_REQ_MODEL_CMT
columns.description: This column stores additional information about the status of the request for a particular risk model's scores, including any error message.
